1.title: The Haunting of Sleepy
1.plot: Happy Halloween Stay safe and Remember there's Darkness around every corner... Universe S-215

1.title: How I Started Youtube
1.plot: In this short, Sleepy finally reveals the reason he started Youtube and it turns out Hydro may have had something to do with it.

2.title: The Haunting Of Sleepy
2.plot: October sure is a scary time, but what will Sleepy do when the ghost in his house kidnaps his friend Hydro?

imdb.plot outline: In a truly wacky world, in the 21st century, a group of teens get caught up in some weird events including, but not limited to, being tackled in a field and forced to do YouTube, kidnapped by a demon teddy bear, being kidnapped by a demon teddy bear again, escape the dimension and gain a tool that allows you to hop between universes, accidentally making a device become sentient and nuke the world, being chased by a pumpkin man, time travel, clones of themselves from multiple universes and many more.
imdb.title: Mat-Shorts
plot: In the wacky world of today a group of teenagers get into a whole lot of weird adventures that will amaze AND disturb you.

In a truly wacky world, in the 21st century, a group of teens get caught up in some weird events including, but not limited to, being tackled in a field and forced to do YouTube, kidnapped by a demon teddy bear, being kidnapped by a demon teddy bear again, escape the dimension and gain a tool that allows you to hop between universes, accidentally making a device become sentient and nuke the world, being chased by a pumpkin man, time travel, clones of themselves from multiple universes and many more.
